document.full_text: italians voted on sunday in local elections that will show whether a sex scandal, three corruption trials and a stagnating economy have seriously damaged prime minister silvio berlusconi two years before the end of his term.
document.title: local elections to test berlusconi's grip on power
lines_and_colors: italians voted on sunday in local elections that will show whether a sex scandal, three corruption trials and a stagnating economy have seriously damaged prime minister silvio berlusconi two years before the end of his term.
